name: Philippe Hurteau
2005-shows-with: Philippe Hurteau (5), Darren Almond (2), Jean-Louis Aroldo (2), Michel Aubry (2), Eric Baudelaire (2), Marc Bauer (2), Philippe Cognée (2), Philippe Decrauzat (2), Nicolas Delprat (2), Emmanuel Lagarrigue (2), Mathieu Mercier (2), Ida Tursic & Wilfried Mille (2)
